module: Module-level comment: The `audio_codec_config` module configures an audio codec via I2C, adjusting volume and sound types. It utilizes inputs (`clock`, `reset`, `volume_key`, `sound_select`), outputs the I2C clock (`I2C_SCLK`), and bi-directionally communicates via `I2C_SDAT`. Internal signals like `COUNTER_500` and `CLOCK_500` enable clock division for I2C synchronization, while submodules `reg_config` and `adc_configure` prepare and transmit configuration data.
